'''He Who Controls the Spice...''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''.

To complete this achievement, the player needs to paralyze [[Setekh Wenut]] by destroying the Windbite Bullets while it is in its floating state. The Windbite Bullets can be destroyed when hit by '''{{Cryo}}''', '''{{Electro}}''', '''{{Hydro}}''', or '''{{Pyro}}''' attacks.

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is a reference to the 1965 novel ''{{w|Dune (Novel)|Dune}}'', which is famous for its {{w|Sandworm_(Dune)|sandworms}} and its miraculous drug nicknamed "{{w|Melange (fictional drug)|the spice}}."
